#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
char arr[100009];
char ar[100009];
int s[100009];
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
              scanf("%s",arr);
              scanf("%s",ar);
              int k,l,i,j;
              k=strlen(arr);
              l=strlen(ar);
              for(i=0;i<k;i++)
              arr[i]=(int)arr[i]-65;
              for(i=0;i<l;i++)
              ar[i]=(int)ar[i]-65;
              int v=0;
              i=k-1;
              j=l-1;
              int carry=0;
              int flag=1;
              while(flag!=0)
              {
                if(i>=0&&j>=0)
                {
                s[v]=arr[i]+ar[j]+carry;
                carry=s[v]/26;
                s[v]=s[v]%26;
                }
                else if(i>=0&&j<0)
                {
                 s[v]=arr[i]+carry;
                carry=s[v]/26;
                s[v]=s[v]%26;
                }
                else if(i<0&&j>=0)
                {
                s[v]=ar[j]+carry;
                 carry=s[v]/26;
                 s[v]=s[v]%26;
                 }
                else if(i<0&&j<0)
                {
                s[v]=carry;
                carry=s[v]/26;
                s[v]=s[v]%26;
                }
                i--;
                j--;                 
                if(i<0&&j<0&&carry==0)
                break;
                 v++;
                
              }
              for(i=v;i>=0;i--)
              printf("%c",s[i]+65);
              printf("\n");
              }
    return 0;
}
